analyzed: g-ya' zhing rnag che 'bus gang la //
translated: It itches, has much pus, and is filled with worms.

original: mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang //
analyzed: mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang //

original: gor gor por gnas zlum po yin //🔽g-ya' zhing phra tsag gnag pa dang // chu ser mang ba glang shu yin //
analyzed: gor gor por gnas zlum po yin // g-ya' zhing phra tsag gnag pa dang // chu ser mang ba glang shu yin //

original: rtsub cing srab la mtha' ma dmar //
analyzed: rtsub cing srab la mtha' ma dmar //
translated: It is rough, thin, and red at the edges.🔽It is dark inside, raised,

original: nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang // zug cing tsha la na zhing rnags //
analyzed: nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang // zug cing tsha la na zhing rnags //
translated: painful, hot, and itchy.🔽It is covered with rough pustules,

original: 'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang // ri shya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra pa //
analyzed: 'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang // ri shya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra pa //

original: 'bu mang ri shya'i lce 'drar bshad //
analyzed: 'bu mang ri shya'i lce 'drar bshad //

original: glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags //
analyzed: glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags //

original: gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba //
analyzed: gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba //

original: rdul mi 'byung zhing nya lpags 'dra //
analyzed: rdul mi 'byung zhing nya lpags 'dra //

original: 'brum bu phra mo thug thug po //
analyzed: 'brum bu phra mo thug thug po //

original: reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang // g-ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin //
analyzed: reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang // g-ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin //
translated: When touched, it is rough, itchy, hard, and black.

original: sha bkra nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam //
analyzed: sha bkra nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam //
translated: It is a rash, rough inside and smooth outside.

original: phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang // reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la /
analyzed: phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang // reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la /

original: ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar //
analyzed: ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar //

original: phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung //
analyzed: phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung //

original: rmen bu dmar po g-ya' dang ldan //
analyzed: rmen bu dmar po g-ya' dang ldan //

original: khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya //

analyzed: @154b rkang pa lag pa gas pa dang // mi bzad na zhing g-ya' tshabs chung //

original: rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the splitting of the hands and feet.

original: thor bu dmar pos khyab pa dang / ring du mched cing d'ur ba 'dra //
analyzed: thor bu dmar pos khyab pa dang / ring du mched cing d'ur ba 'dra //

original: pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra //
analyzed: pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra //

original: g-ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang // zlum por byung ba shu ba yin //
analyzed: g-ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang // zlum por byung ba shu ba yin //
translated: Itching, firm, and raised, round, and with pustules.

original: rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na //
analyzed: rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na //
translated: If the root is thick and hot,

original: dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang //
analyzed: dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang //
translated: red, and blackish, with many wounds,

original: rnag cing 'bu mang kha brgya pa //
analyzed: rnag cing 'bu mang kha brgya pa //

original: phal cher kun tu skye ba yin //
analyzed: phal cher kun tu skye ba yin //
translated: it is mostly a case of all-over leprosy.

original: mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar //
analyzed: mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar //

original: g-ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang // mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab //
analyzed: g-ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang // mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab //
translated: elevated, and covered with firm lines.

original: padma'i 'dab ma ltar rgyas shing //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma ltar rgyas shing //
translated: It spreads like lotus petals,

original: stug cing chu ser khrag mang la //🔽phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin //
analyzed: stug cing chu ser khrag mang la // phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin //
translated: thick, with much lymph and blood,🔽mostly quickly breaking open, it is white lotus leprosy.

original: pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar //
analyzed: pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar //
translated: The skin is thin, with white pustules,

original: dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin /
analyzed: dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin /
translated: filled with red, it is pustular leprosy.🔽Itching, oozing, and extremely painful,

original: g-ya' ba'i nad ni g-ya' ba dang // 'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang // 'brum pa phra nag mang po ni //
analyzed: g-ya' ba'i nad ni g-ya' ba dang // 'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang // 'brum pa phra nag mang po ni //
translated: with many small black pustules,

original: phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung //
analyzed: phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung //
translated: it mostly occurs in the anus and elbows.

original: thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod //
analyzed: thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod //

original: g-ya' zhing dro tsha na dang bcas //
analyzed: g-ya' zhing dro tsha na dang bcas //
translated: itching, hot, and with pustules,

original: dmar la pags ba myags pa yin //
analyzed: dmar la pags ba myags pa yin //
translated: The skin becomes red and putrefied.

original: 'ol ma se ni rab tsha na //
analyzed: 'ol ma se ni rab tsha na //
translated: In the case of the Olmasey,

original: stod ni dmar zhing gnag ba ste //
analyzed: stod ni dmar zhing gnag ba ste //
translated: the upper part of the body becomes red and black,

original: 'ol ma se yi 'bras bu 'dra //
analyzed: 'ol ma se yi 'bras bu 'dra //
translated: like the fruit of the Olmasey.

original: mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan //
analyzed: mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan //

original: de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur //🔽mdze nad nad gzhi shas che ba //
analyzed: de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur // mdze nad nad gzhi shas che ba //
translated: The color changes in many ways.🔽The main condition of leprosy is

original: nad dbye shes las bshad pa yi //
analyzed: nad dbye shes las bshad pa yi //
translated: the signs explained in the classification of diseases.

original: mtshan ma las kyis bstan pa yi //
analyzed: mtshan ma las kyis bstan pa yi //
translated: The signs taught by the actions🔽of all the diseases that arise from the development🔽and the signs explained in the omens of death

original: nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang // gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang // rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang //
analyzed: nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang // gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang // rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang //
translated: are abandoned in the bones, marrow, and semen.

original: tshil la gnas pa 'tshor btsam //
analyzed: tshil la gnas pa 'tshor btsam //

original: mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka' //
analyzed: mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka' //

original: rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang // pags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla //
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang // pags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla //

original: de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze //
analyzed: de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze //
translated: Among them, the leprosy that resides in the skin

analyzed: zug cing rtsub la mdog mi sdug / khrag gnas rdul 'byung gnyid che skrang //

analyzed: sha la gnas pa rkang ba dang // lag par 'brum bu 'byung ba dang // tshigs gnas lhag par tshigs 'drul skem //
translated: The flesh is the cause of boils on the feet and hands, and of the joints being swollen and stiff.

original: rkang ba 'jas @155a * //
analyzed: rkang ba 'jas @155a * //
translated: If it is in the flesh, there will be boils on the hands and feet, and the joints will be especially swollen and dry.

original: 'gyur tshil gnas pa //
analyzed: 'gyur tshil gnas pa //
translated: If it is in the fat,

original: yan lag zhig par byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: yan lag zhig par byed par 'gyur //
translated: the limbs will be paralyzed.

original: rus ba rkang gnas sna zhom zhing //
analyzed: rus ba rkang gnas sna zhom zhing //

original: mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang // rma la 'bu zhugs khu bar gnas //🔽bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung //🔽khrag stsogs la ni rim bzhin du //
analyzed: mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang // rma la 'bu zhugs khu bar gnas // bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung // khrag stsogs la ni rim bzhin du //
translated: the eyes red, the voice blocked, and there will be worms in the wounds.🔽If it is in the semen,

original: mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: there will be all the signs in the blood and so forth, in order.

original: gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung //🔽de ni sha bkra chu dang ni //
analyzed: gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung // de ni sha bkra chu dang ni //
translated: Leprosy arises from one of the three humors.🔽It is said to be of two kinds:

original: yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad //
translated: the spreading and the dripping.

original: nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung //
analyzed: nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung //

original: rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin //
analyzed: rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin //

original: mkhris gyur padma'i 'dab ltar dmar //
analyzed: mkhris gyur padma'i 'dab ltar dmar //

original: tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed //
analyzed: tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed //

original: bad kan las skya stug cing lci //
analyzed: bad kan las skya stug cing lci //

original: g-ya' bcas rim bzhin khrag chu dang ni //
analyzed: g-ya' bcas rim bzhin khrag chu dang ni //

original: sha dang tshil la brten par bshad //
analyzed: sha dang tshil la brten par bshad //

original: 'di dag mdog ni gnyi ga yin //
analyzed: 'di dag mdog ni gnyi ga yin //

original: de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka' //
analyzed: de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka' //

original: spu dkar ma yin srab pa dang // phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung //
analyzed: spu dkar ma yin srab pa dang // phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung //
translated: If the white patches are not extensive, not mixed with each other, and are new,

original: mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla //
analyzed: mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla //

original: de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin //

original: mdoms dang lag mthil mchur byung ba //
analyzed: mdoms dang lag mthil mchur byung ba //
translated: If they occur in the genitals, palms of the hands, or lips,

original: gsar du byung yang gso bar dka' //
analyzed: gsar du byung yang gso bar dka' //
translated: they are difficult to cure even if they are new.

original: nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni //
analyzed: nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni //
translated: Most diseases are based on food and

original: mal gcig reg stsogs la brten las //
analyzed: mal gcig reg stsogs la brten las //
translated: contact with the same bedding, etc.

analyzed: thams cad 'go ste mig nad dang // mdze nad lhag par 'gos pa yin //

original: sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas //
analyzed: sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas //

original: da ni srin bu'i nad bshad bya //
analyzed: da ni srin bu'i nad bshad bya //

analyzed: phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis // srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad //

analyzed: phyi yi dri mas bad kan khrag / bshang skyes dbye bas rnam bzhi yin //
translated: The external ones are of four types by the division into those born from phlegm, blood, and feces.

original: ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur //
analyzed: ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur //
translated: From these, twenty types arise.

original: de la phyi yi khrag las byung //
analyzed: de la phyi yi khrag las byung //

analyzed: tshad dbyibs mdog ni til 'bru 'dra //
translated: are the size of sesame seeds, and are round and white.

analyzed: skra dang gos la brten pa yin // phra zhing rkang pa mang la ming //
translated: They are based on hair and clothes.

original: shig dang sro ma zhes bya'o /
analyzed: shig dang sro ma zhes bya'o /

analyzed: gnyi gas thor bu 'brum bu dang // g-yan pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur //

original: nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste //
analyzed: nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste //
translated: The internal type of leprosy has the same cause.

original: de las bad kan las mang skye //
analyzed: de las bad kan las mang skye //

analyzed: zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang // tsha dang 'bras sar chan la dga' // mi gtsang byung bcas bshang @155b lam nas //

original: log 'dab mal stsogs dga' //
analyzed: log 'dab mal stsogs dga' //

original: bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su 'byung //
analyzed: bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su 'byung //

analyzed: skyes nas kun du 'gro ba yin // la la 'breng ba 'dra ba yi na //

original: la la srin bu kho la ma 'dra //
analyzed: la la srin bu kho la ma 'dra //

original: kha cig myu gu 'bus pa 'dra //
analyzed: kha cig myu gu 'bus pa 'dra //

analyzed: phra zhing ring la chung ba dang ; / dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin //

original: de yi ming ni rnam bdun te //
analyzed: de yi ming ni rnam bdun te //
translated: Its names are seven:

original: rgyu ma zad dang lto nang 'khyil //
analyzed: rgyu ma zad dang lto nang 'khyil //

original: snying za ya mtshan chen po dang // mi mngon rgyu dang 'jag ma 'dra //
analyzed: snying za ya mtshan chen po dang // mi mngon rgyu dang 'jag ma 'dra //
translated: The invisible cause, and the straw-like.

original: dri zhi ma zhes bya de rnams ni //
analyzed: dri zhi ma zhes bya de rnams ni //
translated: These are called the seven names.🔽The heart palpitates, the mouth drools,

analyzed: snying 'phar kha chu 'dzag pa dang // zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chas //

original: brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon //
analyzed: brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon //

analyzed: skom zhing sbrid pa cham pas 'de pas // khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nad nas //
translated: One is thirsty, numb, and has a cold.🔽From the blood-carrying channels,

original: khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra //
analyzed: khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra //
translated: A tiny worm arises from the blood.

original: zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar //
analyzed: zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar //

original: phra zhing la lar bltar mi snang ;
analyzed: phra zhing la lar bltar mi snang ;

analyzed: / skra rtsa za zhing sbu 'byi byed //

original: sbu gling au dum b'a ra 'dra //
analyzed: sbu gling au dum b'a ra 'dra //

original: zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste //
analyzed: zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste //

analyzed: drug po de dag mdze las gcig / zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes // 'phel nas thur du rgyu bar byed //

original: de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na //
analyzed: de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na //
translated: When it grows larger,

original: gang tshe ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs //
analyzed: gang tshe ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs //
translated: When it enters the place of the anus,

original: de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba //
analyzed: de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba //
translated: then flatus and belching

original: phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur //
translated: become foul-smelling like excrement.🔽The worm is called the five-named,🔽because of its round shape, thin body, thick body,

original: zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang // smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag / srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste //
analyzed: zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang // smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag / srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste //
translated: brown, yellow, white, and black color,

original: kham gyi zas dang dal gyis 'gro ;
analyzed: kham gyi zas dang dal gyis 'gro ;
translated: and because it feeds on coarse food and moves slowly.

original: / myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang // lus la gnod byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: / myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang // lus la gnod byed ces bya'o //
translated: It is called the experiencer, the greedy, and the body-harmer.

analyzed: des 'khru gzer dang rtug skam byed // skem zhing mdog ni skya ba dang // ba spu ldang zhing me drod nyams //
translated: It causes diarrhea, pain, and constipation.🔽It causes emaciation, pale complexion,🔽goosebumps, and loss of body heat.

original: lci g-ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed //
analyzed: lci g-ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed //
translated: It causes heaviness, itching, and prolapse of the rectum.🔽This concludes the fourteenth chapter on the location of diseases

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las //🔽nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las // nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o /

original: // / de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the diseases of wind disorders will be explained.

original: rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la //🔽'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu //
analyzed: rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la // 'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu //
translated: Wind is both beneficial and harmful,🔽and is the single cause of various [diseases].

original: khyad par du ni lus kyi ni //
analyzed: khyad par du ni lus kyi ni //
translated: In particular, it is the cause of

original: @156a * // nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu //
analyzed: @156a * // nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu //
translated: Sickness and health have the same cause.

original: de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid //
analyzed: de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid //
translated: He is the creator, the lord of all.

original: sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag //🔽'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag // 'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso //
translated: He is the lord of all beings, having a variety of forms.🔽He is the creator, the holder, the supreme Vishnu.

original: sdud byed 'chi bdag gshin rjer 'gyur //🔽de bas de ldang mi 'dra bar ;
analyzed: sdud byed 'chi bdag gshin rjer 'gyur // de bas de ldang mi 'dra bar ;
translated: He is the gatherer, the lord of death, the lord of the dead.🔽Therefore, always strive

original: / rtag tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis //🔽de yis tha mal gzhan gyur las //
analyzed: / rtag tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis // de yis tha mal gzhan gyur las //
translated: to rise up from that.🔽From that, the various types of sickness

original: nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad //
analyzed: nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad //
translated: are said to arise.

original: bsdus dang rgyas pa de'i ming gnas //
analyzed: bsdus dang rgyas pa de'i ming gnas //

original: rgyu ba'i lam ni re re lnga //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i lam ni re re lnga //
translated: are explained in the five sections on the channels.

original: nad tshul shes par bshad pa yin //
analyzed: nad tshul shes par bshad pa yin //
translated: The way of sickness is explained.

original: 'dir ni nad kyi rnam gyur ba //
analyzed: 'dir ni nad kyi rnam gyur ba //
translated: Here, the transformation of sickness🔽is explained in terms of its types, the basis of sickness,

original: de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang // mtshan nyid bcas pa nyid du bshad //
analyzed: de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang // mtshan nyid bcas pa nyid du bshad //
translated: and its characteristics.

original: grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi //
analyzed: grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi //
translated: Although there are countless types of sickness,

original: grangs su sngar ni bshad pa yin //
analyzed: grangs su sngar ni bshad pa yin //

analyzed: lus zung zad byed bsten drags pas // rlung ni 'khrugs par byed 'gyur te ;
translated: When the body is exhausted by overexertion,🔽the wind becomes agitated.

original: / sbu gu stong par rgyu gyur pa //
analyzed: / sbu gu stong par rgyu gyur pa //
translated: It moves through the hollow channels.

original: de nyid shin tu 'gengs bar byed //
analyzed: de nyid shin tu 'gengs bar byed //

original: nad gzhan gyis ni gang ba der //
analyzed: nad gzhan gyis ni gang ba der //

analyzed: khebs pas mthu can nyid du 'gyur //

analyzed: de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs // gzer dang rgyu ma sgra bcas sbo //
translated: It enters the place of the undigested food,🔽causing colic, rumbling in the intestines,

original: bshang 'gags rje'u nang gzhang 'brum skye //🔽rgyab dang rked pa mjug mdor na //
analyzed: bshang 'gags rje'u nang gzhang 'brum skye // rgyab dang rked pa mjug mdor na //
translated: constipation, hemorrhoids in the rectum,🔽and pain in the back, waist, and anus.

original: ro smad kyi ni phyogs de ru //
analyzed: ro smad kyi ni phyogs de ru //
translated: In the lower part of the body,

original: mi bzad gnod pa de de skyed //🔽ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dang slon //
analyzed: mi bzad gnod pa de de skyed // ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dang slon //
translated: it produces unbearable harm.🔽When it enters the place of undigested food, it causes thirst, belching,

original: lud pa dbugs mi bde gsud nad //
analyzed: lud pa dbugs mi bde gsud nad //
translated: phlegm, dyspnea, and diarrhea.

original: lkog ma 'gags shing sgregs mang na /
analyzed: lkog ma 'gags shing sgregs mang na /

original: lte ba yan chad skyed par byed //
analyzed: lte ba yan chad skyed par byed //

original: rna ba stsogs zhugs dbang por gnod //
analyzed: rna ba stsogs zhugs dbang por gnod //

original: pags zhugs gas shing rtsub par byed //
analyzed: pags zhugs gas shing rtsub par byed //
translated: When it enters the skin, it causes cracking and roughness.

original: khrag zhugs gnyid stug mi bzad na //
analyzed: khrag zhugs gnyid stug mi bzad na //
translated: When it enters the blood, it causes deep sleep, unbearable

original: tsha zhing dmar la mdog mi sdug / thor 'byung kha zas sra bar gnas //
analyzed: tsha zhing dmar la mdog mi sdug / thor 'byung kha zas sra bar gnas //
translated: heat, redness, an ugly complexion, eruptions, and a solid feeling in the food.🔽When it enters the channels, it causes

original: yi ga 'chus skom mgo 'khor na //
analyzed: yi ga 'chus skom mgo 'khor na //
translated: loss of appetite, thirst, and dizziness.

analyzed: sha tshil la gnas rmen bu dang // rab tu zug cing lus rtsub la //

original: lus lci rab na rengs pa dang // khu tshur dbyig pas phog snyam byed //
analyzed: lus lci rab na rengs pa dang // khu tshur dbyig pas phog snyam byed //
translated: It feels as if struck by a fist or a club.

original: rus gnas brla dang rus tshigs na //
analyzed: rus gnas brla dang rus tshigs na //
translated: If it is located in the bones, the thighs, or the joints,

original: mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad //
analyzed: mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad //

original: rkang @156b gnas rus pa khong stong zhing //
analyzed: rkang @156b gnas rus pa khong stong zhing //

original: gnyid med rtag tu na ba yin //
analyzed: gnyid med rtag tu na ba yin //

original: khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung la //
analyzed: khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung la //

original: 'gags pa'am mdog 'gyur nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gags pa'am mdog 'gyur nyid du 'gyur //

original: mngal gyi khu bar gnas de bzhin //
analyzed: mngal gyi khu bar gnas de bzhin //

original: rtsa rnams stong zhing sbo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsa rnams stong zhing sbo bar 'gyur //
translated: the channels become empty and swollen.🔽If it is located in the bladder, the form becomes weak,

analyzed: chu bar gnas ba gzugs 'jas dang // sgur dang da rgan nad du 'gyur // tshigs la nas ba'i rlung skyung pa //
translated: bent, and old.🔽The vāyu that resides in the joints is like

original: rkyal ba rlung gis gang reg 'dra //🔽brkyang dang bskum par byed pa yis //
analyzed: rkyal ba rlung gis gang reg 'dra // brkyang dang bskum par byed pa yis //

original: bskyod pa na dang bcas par 'gyur //
analyzed: bskyod pa na dang bcas par 'gyur //

original: yan lag kun la brten pa ni //
analyzed: yan lag kun la brten pa ni //

analyzed: zug chag snyam sems 'gul ba dang // rengs dang tshor ba med pa dang // tshigs 'khums 'dar bar byed par 'gyur //

original: gang tshe rtsa chen kun la gnas //
analyzed: gang tshe rtsa chen kun la gnas //
translated: When [the vayu] is present in all the major channels,

original: yang dang yang du 'khrugs gyur pa //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'khrugs gyur pa //

original: de tshe yan lag la 'jug pas //
analyzed: de tshe yan lag la 'jug pas //

original: nad ni lus la 'jug ces bya //
analyzed: nad ni lus la 'jug ces bya //

original: ro smad du ni 'gag pa'i rlung //
analyzed: ro smad du ni 'gag pa'i rlung //

original: gyen du song ste snying gar gnas //
analyzed: gyen du song ste snying gar gnas //

original: snying ga'i sbu gur zhugs nas ni //
analyzed: snying ga'i sbu gur zhugs nas ni //

original: mgo bo yan lag bcas bar zug / lus ni kun du zhugs gyur na //
analyzed: mgo bo yan lag bcas bar zug / lus ni kun du zhugs gyur na //

analyzed: de ni gzhu ltar sgu bor byed //

original: dbugs 'byin dka' zhing mig rengs har //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin dka' zhing mig rengs har //

original: lhod cing 'dzums par byed 'gyur la //
analyzed: lhod cing 'dzums par byed 'gyur la //

original: de nas phug ron lta bur 'khun //
analyzed: de nas phug ron lta bur 'khun //

original: dran pa med de gzhan dbang can //
analyzed: dran pa med de gzhan dbang can //

original: de nyid aa ba ta nar bshad //
analyzed: de nyid aa ba ta nar bshad //

original: rlung gis snying ni btang gyur na //
analyzed: rlung gis snying ni btang gyur na //
translated: When the vayu is released from the heart,

original: skad cig tsam du bde la reg / slar zhugs na ni na bar byed //
analyzed: skad cig tsam du bde la reg / slar zhugs na ni na bar byed //
translated: If it enters, it causes pain.🔽If it arises from destruction of the womb,🔽or from excessive bleeding,

analyzed: de ni mngal 'jig las byung dang // khrag ni lhag bar 'dzag gyur dang // snad pa dag las byung gyur pa //

original: shin tu gso bar dka' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shin tu gso bar dka' bar 'gyur //

original: mjing pa rengs pa'i rlung zhugs shing //
analyzed: mjing pa rengs pa'i rlung zhugs shing //

original: gang tshe rtsa chen la gnas pa //
analyzed: gang tshe rtsa chen la gnas pa //

original: lus kun khyab par gyur pa na //
analyzed: lus kun khyab par gyur pa na //

analyzed: de tshe nam tshong 'gugs par byed //

analyzed: lus ni gzhu ltar nang du gug / mig rengs shugs ni 'byin par byed //

analyzed: glal 'byung so ni 'cha' ba dang // bad kan skyugs par byed par 'gyur //

analyzed: 'gram pa rgyab dang mgo bo na //

original: 'di ni nang du gug ces bya //
analyzed: 'di ni nang du gug ces bya //

original: phyi yi de dang 'dra ba la //
analyzed: phyi yi de dang 'dra ba la //

analyzed: lus ni phyir dgyed byed pa dang // mgo bo rgyab tu 'dren byed cing //

analyzed: de la brang ni shin tu 'bur // gnya' ba bcom pa ltar na zhing //

analyzed: so dang kha ni mdog mi sdug / rdul zhing lus ni lhod par byed //

analyzed: phyir dgyed gzhu rengs zhes bya zhing //

original: de la shugs drag ces kyang bshad //
analyzed: de la shugs drag ces kyang bshad //

original: gnad la gnas pa'i rmar zhugs te //
analyzed: gnad la gnas pa'i rmar zhugs te //

analyzed: rlung gis bskyod par gyur ba dang // rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar //

original: lus la nad kyis khyab byed pa //
analyzed: lus la nad kyis khyab byed pa //

original: skam zhing lus ni skya gyur pa //
analyzed: skam zhing lus ni skya gyur pa //

analyzed: rma yi da rgan de spang bya //

original: lus la 'jug pa'i rlung kun ni //
analyzed: lus la 'jug pa'i rlung kun ni //

original: shugs dang bral nas bde bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shugs dang bral nas bde bar 'gyur //

original: lce ni thud drags skam zos gnod //
analyzed: lce ni thud drags skam zos gnod //

analyzed: 'gram pa'i rtsa bar gnas rlung 'khrugs //

analyzed: 'gram pa gnyis ni bskyod bya nas //

original: kha ni gdangs par byed pa'am //
analyzed: kha ni gdangs par byed pa'am //

original: yang na 'dzums par byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na 'dzums par byed par 'gyur //

original: 'gram pa nyams par byed pa des //
analyzed: 'gram pa nyams par byed pa des //

original: za dang smra ba dka' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: za dang smra ba dka' bar 'gyur //

analyzed: smra bar byed pa'i rtsa gnas rlung //

analyzed: lce ni ldi bas par byed 'gyur zhing //

analyzed: lce ldibs des ni bza' btung dang // smra ba la sogs mi nus 'gyur //
translated: Because the tongue is paralyzed, one is unable to eat, drink, speak, and so on.🔽Carrying a load on the head, laughing too much, talking too much,

analyzed: mgo bos khur ni khyer pa dang ; / dgod drags mang du smra ba dang // sngangs dang gcus te sbrid pa gtong //
translated: frightening, twisting, and sneezing🔽draw up the vāyu.🔽Drawing the bow, hitting, sleeping unevenly,🔽eating hard food, and generating vāyu here and there

analyzed: gzhu sra 'dren par byed pa dang // sdas ni mi mnyam la nyal dang // sra ba 'cha' bar byed pa dang // rlung skyed pa ni de dang des //

original: rlung 'phel ro stod la zhugs nas //
analyzed: rlung 'phel ro stod la zhugs nas //

analyzed: gdong gi gzhogs phyed yon por byed //

original: sma ba dgod dang lta ba'ang yo //
analyzed: sma ba dgod dang lta ba'ang yo //

original: de nas de yi mgo 'gul zhing //
analyzed: de nas de yi mgo 'gul zhing //

original: tshig mi phyin la mig rengs shing //
analyzed: tshig mi phyin la mig rengs shing //

original: so 'gul skad ni 'gags pa dang // sgra mi thos shing sbrid pa thogs //
analyzed: so 'gul skad ni 'gags pa dang // sgra mi thos shing sbrid pa thogs //

original: dri mi tshor zhing dran nyams rmongs //
analyzed: dri mi tshor zhing dran nyams rmongs //

original: gnyid log ba nang dang bar 'gyur ;
analyzed: gnyid log ba nang dang bar 'gyur ;
translated: When falling asleep, the body turns to the left.🔽 Saliva is secreted on the left side, and one eye is closed.

analyzed: / mchil ma g-yon du 'dor ba dang // mig gcig 'dzums par 'gyur pa dang // nam tshong yan chad mi bzad na //

analyzed: gzhogs phyed dag gam ro smad na // la las de gzhogs phyed nad bshad //

original: gzhan dag phyogs gcig gug ces zer //
analyzed: gzhan dag phyogs gcig gug ces zer //
translated: Others say it is a curvature of the body.

original: rlung ni khrag la @157b brten gyur te //
analyzed: rlung ni khrag la @157b brten gyur te //
translated: The wind is based on the blood,

original: spyi bo 'dzin pa'i rtar zhugs pa //
analyzed: spyi bo 'dzin pa'i rtar zhugs pa //

original: rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed //
analyzed: rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed //

original: rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung //
analyzed: rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung //

original: rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung //
analyzed: rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung //

original: rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams byas nas //
analyzed: rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams byas nas //
translated: Having dried up the channels and ligaments,

original: gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod //
analyzed: gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod //

original: tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod par byed //
analyzed: tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod par byed //

original: de yis lus phyed thams cad ni //
analyzed: de yis lus phyed thams cad ni //
translated: By that, the entire half of the body

original: las sbyor mi nus tshor ba med //
analyzed: las sbyor mi nus tshor ba med //

original: de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer //
analyzed: de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer //

original: gzhan dag phyogs gcig bskams par 'chad //
analyzed: gzhan dag phyogs gcig bskams par 'chad //

original: lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra //
analyzed: lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra //

original: yan lag kun la brten pa yin //
analyzed: yan lag kun la brten pa yin //

original: rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs byed bskams //
analyzed: rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs byed bskams //
translated: The wind disease that is the cause of the wasting of the side is dry.

original: shin tu gse dka' yin par bshad //
analyzed: shin tu gse dka' yin par bshad //
translated: It is said to be very difficult to cure.

original: gzhan dang 'dres pa 'ang gso dka' yin //
analyzed: gzhan dang 'dres pa 'ang gso dka' yin //

original: zad byed rgyu can spang bar bya //
analyzed: zad byed rgyu can spang bar bya //

original: ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis //
analyzed: ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis //
translated: When the undigested phlegm is combined with the wind,

original: rgyun srang bkag ste lus rengs pas //
analyzed: rgyun srang bkag ste lus rengs pas //

original: brkyang bskum kun las nyams 'gyur ba //
analyzed: brkyang bskum kun las nyams 'gyur ba //

original: shing 'dra shing ltar rengs pa yin //
analyzed: shing 'dra shing ltar rengs pa yin //
translated: It is like a log, like a log, stiff.

original: phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung //
analyzed: phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung //
translated: The wind that enters the base of the shoulder

original: der gnas rtsa ni 'khums byas te //
analyzed: der gnas rtsa ni 'khums byas te //
translated: causes the veins that are there to contract.

original: dpung pa bskyod par mi nus byed //
analyzed: dpung pa bskyod par mi nus byed //
translated: It makes the arm unable to be moved.

original: dpung pa 'jas pa'i rlung nad yin //
analyzed: dpung pa 'jas pa'i rlung nad yin //
translated: It is the wind disease of the stiff arm.

original: gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel //
analyzed: gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel //

analyzed: byi ba'i dug ni ldang ba ltar //

analyzed: khyab ste rtogs par dka' zhes bya //

analyzed: rtogs dka' sngar bas lhag par na //

analyzed: skrang zhing mkhrang la tshos par byed //

original: gzhang dang tshigs dang rus pa rkang //
analyzed: gzhang dang tshigs dang rus pa rkang //

analyzed: bcad snyam sems shing nang du rgyu //

analyzed: shugs dang ldan tshe sgur po dang / zha bo 'theng por byed 'gyur la //

original: lus ni kun du rgyu ba yin //
analyzed: lus ni kun du rgyu ba yin //

original: de la rlung shas tshe gyur na /
analyzed: de la rlung shas tshe gyur na /

analyzed: gzer 'gul zug pa'i shas che zhing //

original: skrang pa rtsub cing gnag pa dang // sdo zhing 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skrang pa rtsub cing gnag pa dang // sdo zhing 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur //

analyzed: rtsa chen sor mo'i tshigs rnams ni //

original: 'khums shing lus bcum bzhin du na //
analyzed: 'khums shing lus bcum bzhin du na //
translated: are contracted, as if the body were bent.

original: grang la mi dga' reg na bde //
analyzed: grang la mi dga' reg na bde //

original: rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med //
analyzed: rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med //

analyzed: khrag shas che skrang rab tu zug / dmar zhing tsha ba tseg tseg byed //

original: snum dang rtsub bas zhi mi 'gyur //
analyzed: snum dang rtsub bas zhi mi 'gyur //

original: g-ya' dang 'drul bar ldan pa yin //
analyzed: g-ya' dang 'drul bar ldan pa yin //

analyzed: mkhris gyur tsha zhing rmongs bag dang // rdul zhing brgyal myos skom dad che //

original: reg mi bzod cing na la dmar //
analyzed: reg mi bzod cing na la dmar //

original: skrang zhing smin la shin tu bro //
analyzed: skrang zhing smin la shin tu bro //

original: bad kan gyis 'gul mi shes lci //
analyzed: bad kan gyis 'gul mi shes lci //

original: tshor med snum zhing grang ba dang // g-ya' zhing cung zad na ba yin //
analyzed: tshor med snum zhing grang ba dang // g-ya' zhing cung zad na ba yin //

original: 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin //

original: nad gcig las byung gsar gso sla //
analyzed: nad gcig las byung gsar gso sla //

original: nad gnyis las byung 'tsho btsam //
analyzed: nad gnyis las byung 'tsho btsam //

analyzed: 'dus pa las byung chu ser 'dzag / rengs dang thor bu 'byang ba spang //
translated: The one arising from their combination is a discharge of pus.

original: rlung ni yan lag tshigs gnas pa //
analyzed: rlung ni yan lag tshigs gnas pa //

original: khrag gi lam la myur gnod byed //
analyzed: khrag gi lam la myur gnod byed //

original: de gnyis phan tshun 'dres gyur pa'i //
analyzed: de gnyis phan tshun 'dres gyur pa'i //
translated: When those two are mixed with each other,

original: nad kyis srog ni 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: nad kyis srog ni 'phrog par byed //

original: lnga yi bdag nyid can rlung las //
analyzed: lnga yi bdag nyid can rlung las //

original: srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang // 'grangs drags @159a * //
analyzed: srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang // 'grangs drags @159a * //
translated: injury,

original: snad dang lam gyis dub //
analyzed: snad dang lam gyis dub //
translated: and exhaustion from the road,🔽the suppression of strength, and excessive exertion

original: shugs bkag nan gyis brtsir rab yis //
analyzed: shugs bkag nan gyis brtsir rab yis //
translated: agitate the wind,

original: 'khrugs nas mig la sogs pa la //🔽nye bar gnod bskyed byed cing //
analyzed: 'khrugs nas mig la sogs pa la // nye bar gnod bskyed byed cing //

original: cham pa nyam thag skom lud pa //
analyzed: cham pa nyam thag skom lud pa //
translated: It produces the illnesses of chills, exhaustion, thirst, and phlegm,

original: dbugs mi bde sogs nad ma bskyed //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde sogs nad ma bskyed //
translated: and dyspnea and so forth.🔽The agitation of the wind by the upper movement, numbness, belching,🔽hiccups, the suppression of sleep,

original: stod rgyu sbrid pa sgregs pa dang // sbyugs pa gnyid ni bkag pa dang // khur lci 'degs dang drag tu ngu //
analyzed: stod rgyu sbrid pa sgregs pa dang // sbyugs pa gnyid ni bkag pa dang // khur lci 'degs dang drag tu ngu //

original: dgod drags sogs kyis nad 'khrugs te //
analyzed: dgod drags sogs kyis nad 'khrugs te //
translated: and excessive laughter and so forth,

original: mgul pa 'gags shing sems nyams la //🔽cham 'debs slong zhin gyi ga 'chus //
analyzed: mgul pa 'gags shing sems nyams la // cham 'debs slong zhin gyi ga 'chus //
translated: The throat is blocked, the mind is impaired,🔽and one is afflicted with a chronic cough.

original: mgul par lba ba sogs skyed cing //
analyzed: mgul par lba ba sogs skyed cing //
translated: Goiters and so forth are produced in the throat,

original: nam 'tshong yan chad brten nad skyed //
analyzed: nam 'tshong yan chad brten nad skyed //

original: khyab byed 'gro dang 'du drags dang / rtsed mo drags dang mi bzod spyod //
analyzed: khyab byed 'gro dang 'du drags dang / rtsed mo drags dang mi bzod spyod //
translated: The all-pervading [winds] are disturbed by excessive walking, excessive sexual activity, excessive play, and engaging in what is unbearable.

original: kha zas mi mthun rtsub 'jigs dga' //
analyzed: kha zas mi mthun rtsub 'jigs dga' //

original: yi mu ga sogs kyis 'khrugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yi mu ga sogs kyis 'khrugs par 'gyur //
translated: One is disturbed by indigestion and so forth.

original: khu ba stobs dang spro ba nyams //
analyzed: khu ba stobs dang spro ba nyams //
translated: The strength of the semen and enthusiasm are impaired.

original: skra dang sems g-yengs rims kyi 'debs //
analyzed: skra dang sems g-yengs rims kyi 'debs //
translated: The hair and mind are agitated, and one is afflicted with a contagious disease.

original: yan lag kun la zug pa dang / spu brtse yan lag tshor ba med //
analyzed: yan lag kun la zug pa dang / spu brtse yan lag tshor ba med //
translated: There is pain in all the limbs, the body hair stands on end, and the limbs are without sensation.

original: mdze dang med dbal gzhan yang ni //
analyzed: mdze dang med dbal gzhan yang ni //
translated: Leprosy, vitiligo, and so forth

original: lus kun khyab pa'i nad skyed 'gyur //
analyzed: lus kun khyab pa'i nad skyed 'gyur //
translated: produce diseases that pervade the entire body.

original: mnyam gnas 'du ba ma snyoms dang / grang dang 'dren ma'i zas zos dang / dus min gnyid log mtshan mo ni //
analyzed: mnyam gnas 'du ba ma snyoms dang / grang dang 'dren ma'i zas zos dang / dus min gnyid log mtshan mo ni //
translated: The harmonious [winds] are disturbed by an imbalance of the combined [winds], eating cold or incompatible food, sleeping at the wrong time,

original: gnyid ma log la sogs kyis 'khugs //
analyzed: gnyid ma log la sogs kyis 'khugs //
translated: and not sleeping at night and so forth.

original: gzer dang skran dang pho nad sogs //
